forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 17C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High 63F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 62F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 19C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 67F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 22C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 72F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High near 20C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 69F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 52F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 1C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 34F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 36F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 37F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with a mix of light rain and snow after midnight. Low 2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies with light rain and snow developing overnight. Low near 35F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.
